TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_pila'_(錢), title = pila'_(錢), year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/pila'_(錢)} }

S.FORM: == pila' == 錢 ana si kpzyux pila' nya'. ungat ana qutux qu gnalu' nya' squliq ga, ungat zywaw nya'. - .
== pila' == 錢 ana si kpzyox pila' nya'. ongat ana qotox qo gnalo' nya' sqoliq ga, ongat zywaw nya'. - .
